golden_diagnosis: 全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis
predict_diagnosis:
1. Myasthenia gravis, generalized (GMG)
2. Thyroiditis-induced myopathy
3. Hashimoto's thyroiditis with neurological manifestations
4. Autoimmune neuromuscular disorder (Miller-Fisher syndrome)
5. Progressive muscular dystrophy (PMD)
6. Inflammatory myopathy (e.g., polymyositis or dermatomyositis)
7. Metabolic myopathy (e.g., McArdle's disease)
8. Mitochondrial myopathy
9. Channelopathy (e.g., periodic paralysis)
10. Spinal muscular atrophy (SMA)

Please note that these top 10 diagnoses are based on the provided patient phenotype and clinical findings, and the list may vary depending on the clinical context and additional information. It is essential to consider these diverse possibilities when evaluating the patient to ensure an accurate and comprehensive diagnosis.
